item.title: Python - 1. Data Manipulation with pandas
item.description: import pandas as pd import numpy as np 1. Transforming DataFrames 1.1 Introducing DataFrames Inspecting a DataFrame When you get a new DataFrame to work with, the first thing you need to do is explore it and see what it contains. pandas has several methods for this. head method (.head()) returns the first few rows of the DataFrame. # create a DataFrame cate = ["Py", "R", "Matlab" ] df = pd.
